Item.Description:
Original JVC HA-FX1X Xtreme Xplosives Ear bud Earphones New In Factory Sealed Package. Our staff is in love with these earphones :-)

Read the feedback left by customers who have bought this product. Check out the reviews listed - several were posted by our customers !
  • Deep bass, great highs
  • Incredible 10.0mm Explosive Driver
  • Flexible cable for better sound, less tangles and improved durability
  • Includes three sets of ear bud gels in small, medium and large
  • Awesome hard storage case with the XX Logo
  • Please note - the eBay description has an error, these fantastic earphones do not have a volume control. We have reported the error to eBay.
  • We offer a 30 day money back guaranty and a one-year repair or replace warranty from any defect in material or workmanship.

Who are we? American Liquidators LLC has been in business since 2007. We purchase inventory from distressed retailers, manufacturer’s discontinued items, closeouts and overstocks. We have an office in the USA and agents in South America and India. Our wholesale accounts buy in lots of 50 of more. When we have smaller lots we sell them off in flea markets, other on-line venues and now eBay. We offer a 30 day money-back guarantee. We will even pay the return shipping on most items. Just contact us first and we will make all the arrangements from there.

  • Shipping anywhere in the USA, APO / FPO, territories and possessions is free.
  • Outside of the USA shipping is just $10 for the first one and $4 for each additional.
  • On shipments outside the USA you are responsible for any import duties, tariffs, taxes or levies - this is not included in the price.
  • USA Shipments please allow up to five business days for delivery; APO/FPO, territories and possessions please allow up to 30 days for delivery.
  • Outside the USA - Canada and Europe, allow up to 25 days for delivery;
  • Everywhere else please allow up to 45 days for delivery.
  • USA shipments - all orders are shipped delivery confirmed.
  • Provide a safe, secure place for your delivery as our insurance ends when the order is delivery confirmed.

Shipments to countries like Russia, most of South America, Mexico, Asia and Micronesia can take a bit longer - up to 60 days, so we ask for your patience in advance, If you have not received your order within the time mentioned just let us know and we will work with you to find a solution.

Your order will ship by USPS First Class Mail or USPS First Class Mail International Parcel. All orders are shipped with a tracking number which you will receive when your order is on its way to you. In the USA please provide a safe and secure place for delivery because our insurance will end when your order is Delivery Confirmed. Our worldwide customers can expect to see their tracking information update until the order leaves the USA. After that you will not see any additional tracking information until you order has been delivered. If you have to have door-to-door tracking for your order we can use USPS Express Mail International at an additional cost.

When your order arrives, if you have any questions or concerns, please be fair and contact us first before leaving feedback. We promise to work with you to make things right, just give us the chance to do so. Fair enough? Positive feedback helps us to keep our costs low and improves our search results. You are counting on us to deliver what we advertise - we are counting on you to be fair and let us resolve any concerns you might have.

Before placing your order, if you have any questions please contact us through the eBay messaging system. Please allow us 24 hours to reply. We really appreciate you considering us as your supplier.

All brand and trademarks are the property of the respective owners.
Item.Title: JVC XTREME XPLOSIVES HA-FX1X Ear Bud Earphones Headphones - Black New In Box
